downloadTitle: Key Health Indicators for Lync Server 2013, Skype for Business Server 2015 and Skype for Business Server 2019
downloadDescription: An updated version of the Key Health Indicators for Lync Server 2013, Skype for Business Server 2015 and Skype for Business Server 2019
detailsSection:
An updated version of the Key Health Indicators for Lync Server 2013, Skype for Business Server 2015 and Skype for Business Server 2019. Key Health Indicators (KHI) are Performance Counters with recommended thresholds aimed at revealing problems that can impact the user experience.
The resources in this download contain the KHI Guide, which outlines the operational process and remediation steps. A sample PowerShell script used to configure KHI Data Collectors. Lastly, the Analysis and Definitions Workbook which can analyze KHI performance data.
systemRequirementsSection:
This download works with the following Office programs:
  • Microsoft Excel 2013 SP1 or later
  • Microsoft Excel 2010 SP2 or later
  • Microsoft Word 2013 SP1 or later
  • Microsoft Word 2010 SP2 or later
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  • Download the ZIP file by clicking the Download button and saving the file to your hard disk
  • Unblock the ZIP file using Windows Explorer
  • Extract the content of the ZIP file to a directory
  • For additional steps please see the included documentation
